Welcome.

This is my personal website and blog. I'm a web developer and have been greatly assisted by dev blogs like this one in my career. I only write about things that I think are helpful or useful to others. I hope you find something useful here.

If you want to read more about me or see cute pictures of my dog, click here.

Jun 23, 2024
